meta.description: Determine the optimal usage time for two machines to minimize waste while meeting medicine delivery requirements to the heart and brain.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: The machines available for delivering medicine.

params.name: medicine_heart
params.description: Units of medicine delivered to the heart per minute by each machine.

params.name: medicine_brain
params.description: Units of medicine delivered to the brain per minute by each machine.

params.name: waste
params.description: Units of waste produced per minute by each machine.

vars.name: time
vars.description: Time in minutes each machine is used.

objective.name: min_total_waste
objective.description: Minimize the total waste produced by using the machines.

constraints.name: heart_medicine_limit
constraints.description: The total units of medicine delivered to the heart must not exceed 8 units.

constraints.name: brain_medicine_requirement
constraints.description: The total units of medicine delivered to the brain must be at least 4 units.
